comments:
Eclipse I20030307 (RC2)

Running a debug session from Eclipse I wanted to change a couple of preferences 
(Window->Preferences).  However the preference pages would not open and this 
log was generated.

I cannot reproduce this in the 0317 integration build by opening the 
preferences dialog and running through all of the pages.  Does it happen for 
you consistently?  And with the 0317 integration build?

I have not seen it on the latest integration builds either.  I do have the 
workspace/environment saved where I can reproduce it if you desire.  

I have no problem with closing this one.

I've verified in the current stream that this native is there and is being 
invoked successfully, so closing.
